news.title: Welcome to the New Academic Year 2024
news.excerpt: We're excited to welcome all students to another promising academic year with new opportunities and exciting activities planned.
news.content: The Madi Makerere University Students Association is thrilled to welcome all students to the new academic year 2024. We have exciting plans and activities lined up for you throughout the semester. Our focus this year will be on academic excellence, cultural preservation, and community building. We encourage all members to actively participate in our programs and events. Together, we can make this academic year the most successful one yet!
news.author: Association President

news.title: Cultural Week Celebration 2024
news.excerpt: Join us for our annual cultural week celebration showcasing the rich traditions and heritage of the Madi people.
news.content: Our annual cultural week celebration is coming up! This is a great opportunity to showcase our rich Madi culture and traditions to the university community. The week-long celebration will feature traditional dances, music, food, and cultural displays. We invite all students, staff, and visitors to join us in celebrating our heritage. The event will take place at the main campus grounds and will include various competitions and performances.
news.author: Cultural Affairs Committee

news.title: Academic Excellence Awards Ceremony
news.excerpt: Congratulations to our members who received academic excellence awards for their outstanding performance in the previous semester.
news.content: We're proud to announce that several of our members have received academic excellence awards for their outstanding performance in the previous semester. The awards ceremony was held at the main hall and was attended by university officials, faculty members, and students. The recipients demonstrated exceptional dedication to their studies and served as role models for their peers. We encourage all members to strive for academic excellence.
news.author: Academic Affairs Committee

news.title: Sports Tournament Results
news.excerpt: Our association teams performed excellently in the recent inter-association sports tournament, bringing home several medals.
news.content: Our association teams performed excellently in the recent inter-association sports tournament, bringing home several medals in football, basketball, and athletics. The tournament was held over three days and featured teams from various student associations across the university. Our athletes demonstrated great sportsmanship and team spirit throughout the competition. We congratulate all participants and look forward to defending our titles in the next tournament.
news.author: Sports Committee

news.title: Community Service Project Success
news.excerpt: Our recent community service project in the local Madi community was a great success, benefiting over 200 families.
news.content: Our recent community service project in the local Madi community was a great success, benefiting over 200 families. The project focused on providing educational materials, health awareness, and basic necessities to families in need. Our members volunteered their time and resources to make this project a reality. The community expressed their gratitude for our efforts and we look forward to continuing our community outreach programs.
news.author: Community Service Committee

about.mission: To foster unity among Madi students at Makerere University, promote academic excellence, provide a platform for personal and professional development, and advocate for student rights and welfare while maintaining strong cultural identity and values.
about.vision: To be the leading student association that empowers Madi students to achieve academic excellence, develop leadership skills, and contribute meaningfully to society while preserving and promoting our rich cultural heritage.
about.history: The Madi Makerere University Students Association was founded in 2009 by a group of dedicated students with the vision of creating a supportive community for Madi students. Over the years, we have grown from a small group of 20 students to a vibrant association with over 500 active members. Our journey has been marked by numerous achievements, including successful cultural celebrations, academic support programs, community service initiatives, and leadership development activities. We continue to evolve and adapt to meet the changing needs of our members while staying true to our core values of unity, excellence, and cultural preservation.
objectives: Promote academic achievement through study groups, mentorship programs, and academic support services
Foster unity and friendship among Madi students through social events, cultural activities, and networking opportunities
Represent student interests and advocate for their rights and welfare within the university and beyond
Preserve and promote Madi culture, traditions, and values through cultural events and educational programs
Develop leadership skills among members through training programs, workshops, and leadership opportunities
Engage in community service projects that benefit society and contribute to national development
achievements: Over 500 active members across all academic years
Organized 50+ successful events and activities annually
15 years of dedicated service to the student community
100+ scholarships and financial aid opportunities facilitated
10+ strategic partnerships with organizations and institutions
